text: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evaṃ vadeyya na tāvāhaṃ ayye etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī ti pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī bhikkhunīhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamānā evaṃ vadeyya na tāvāhaṃ ayye etasmiṃ sikkhāpade sikkhissāmi yāva na aññaṃ bhikkhuniṃ byattaṃ vinayadharaṃ paripucchāmī ti pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 149. Should any bhikkhunī, admonished by the bhikkhunīs in accordance with a rule, say, "Ladies, I will not train myself under this training rule until I have put questions about it to another bhikkhunī, experienced and learned in the discipline," it is to be confessed.
